about_the_game:
A relaxing experience. Explore mysterious places, craft, build and enjoy the silence and beauty of the universe.

As an astronaut stranded in the vast reaches of space after a catastrophic asteroid impact, you find yourself drifting alone in the unknown. Your mission? Scavenge oxygen, salvage debris, and transform your spacesuit into a versatile survival tool while crafting a ship from scratch.

In this peaceful space survival game, you’ll explore the stunning beauty and mysteries of the cosmos. Gather essential resources, tap into advanced alien technologies, and craft vital upgrades as you journey through the vast, silent expanses of space. The game seamlessly blends survival with relaxation, offering an immersive experience that highlights the quiet beauty and tranquility of the universe.

Whether you're seeking adventure or a moment of calm, this game offers a soothing yet captivating exploration of the unknown. Discover, survive, and lose yourself in the wonder of the stars. Your journey awaits.

short_description: A cozy open-world survival game, a relaxing experience in zero gravity. Explore mysterious places, craft, build and collect to reach a colony of your tribe. Enjoy the silence and beauty of the universe. Unravel mysterious puzzles along the way, that could even lead to an entirely different outcome.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
